name: Magnum Rider Z
description:
"Stop right there, criminal scum!"

Another villain is causing trouble in the city again. It is up to Magnum Rider Z to give chase before they escape. Justice must be delivered swiftly... at all cost!

Features:

  • RPG chase scenes without the RPG
  • A cool mecha combination scene
  • Play time of around 10 mins

This short game is an entry to the RPG Maker MZ "You Got It, Now Use It!" Game Jam hosted by Studio Blue.

It is also made as part of the RPG Maker Web forum's One Map Game Challenge limited to only 1 map and a maximum of 10 events, 10 variables and 10 switches.

(Currently there are 10 map events, 0 common events, 10 variables and 9 switches used.)
